name: Outer Space
description: Don't let the astronauts die in the open space, maneuver on the rocket, avoid collisions with asteroids and don't forget about the fuel level!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3+ or higher Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 12 MB available space
